title: An Explosive Article About FBI Corruption (Ep 1847)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking admission by a liberal outlet about the Mar a Lago raid. I also address an eye-opening piece about the FBI’s shocking loss of public trust, and what it means for the future of the Republic. 

News Picks:

Is this the image the FBI wants?


Rolling Stone says the quiet part out loud about the Mar a Lago raid.


Hillary Clinton gets caught lying again. 


Politico Reports White House Anger at CNN Over Negative Coverage of Biden's 'Red' Speech.

Zero-Down mortgages are making a comeback? What could possibly go wrong?


Europe’s energy suicide pact.

Is nuclear war inevitable?
